InstructionData.Title: Furnace Control
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: alias Furnace d0​ alias Purge d1​ alias Fuel d2​ # alias Mixer d3​ alias Switch d4​ ​ alias pressure r0​ alias hasGas r1​ alias switch r2​ alias temperature r3​ alias atTemp r10​ alias minTemp r4​ alias minPressure r5​ alias t0 r10​ alias t1 r11​ alias t2 r12​ alias t3 r13​ move minTemp 1500​ move minPressure 6500​ ​ wait:​ s db Setting 0​ l pressure Furnace Pressure​ sgt hasGas pressure 0​ s Purge On hasGas​ s Fuel On 0​ l switch Switch Setting​ bgtz switch purge​ yield​ j wait​ ​ purge:​ s db Setting 1​ l switch Switch Setting​ bgtz switch wait​ l pressure Furnace Pressure​ sgt hasGas pressure 0​ s Purge On hasGas​ blez pressure regulate​ yield​ j purge​ ​ prime:​ s db Setting 2​ l switch Switch Setting​ bgtz switch wait​ s Furnace Activate 1​ l temperature Furnace Temperature​ sge atTemp temperature minTemp​ bgtz atTemp regulate​ s Fuel On 1​ s Fuel Setting 1​ yield​ j prime​ ​ regulate:​ #s db Setting 3​ s Fuel Setting 1​ l switch Switch Setting​ bgtz switch wait​ l pressure Furnace Pressure​ l temperature Furnace Temperature​ sle t0 temperature minTemp​ sle t1 pressure minPressure​ or t2 t0 t1​ s Fuel On t2​ s Furnace Activate t2​ sub t0 minTemp temperature​ mul t0 t0 5​ max t0 t0 1​ min t0 t0 10​ s Fuel Setting t0​ s db Setting t0​ yield​ j regulate
